description: Officials say there is no sign the incident in Trier, Germany, was politically motivated.
title: Trier: Five die as car ploughs through Germany pedestrian zone
title_page: Trier: Five die as car ploughs through Germany pedestrian zone - BBC News
maintext: Chancellor Angela Merkel said in a statement: "The news from Trier is very sad. My sympathy goes to the relatives of people who were torn from their lives so suddenly and forcibly. I also think of those who have suffered severe injuries and I wish them much strength."
